description:
We get all kinds of girls on Hogtied, but Carly Parker was an original. Not just your typical porn star, Carly has an amazing personality that is real and comes across as real.
Carly walked in scared to death of everything: she hates pain, she hates being flogged, she doesn't want anything on her nipples, she hates being tickled. So what does she like? She likes cock and cuming, and thats about it.
So with all those limits, all those things working against having a good shoot, how do we get to "Possibly Another Hogtied Classic"? We don't know, but this shoot is unique in a way that can not be described by words. To watch her suffer and endure. To see her struggle and beg. To see her progress from scene to scene before your very eyes is for lack of a better word "special".
There is an honesty here that goes beyond anything we have witnessed before, as we watch a girl go from complete novice to "something else" all in one shoot.
title: Welcome Carly Parker and her amazing
